attributes.name: id
attributes.description: ID of broadcast message to retrieve.

apis.name: Create a broadcast message
apis.description: The target_access_levels are defined in the Gitlab::Access module. The following levels are valid:

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: Message to display.

attributes.name: starts_at
attributes.description: Starting time (defaults to current time). Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z)

attributes.name: ends_at
attributes.description: Ending time (defaults to one hour from current time). Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z)

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Background color hex code.

attributes.name: font
attributes.description: Foreground color hex code.

attributes.name: target_access_levels
attributes.description: Target access levels (roles) of the broadcast message.

attributes.name: target_path
attributes.description: Target path of the broadcast message.

attributes.name: broadcast_type
attributes.description: Appearance type (defaults to banner)

attributes.name: dismissable
attributes.description: Can the user dismiss the message?
